list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the firing of a gun or cannon.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he brought down a caribou with a single shot to the neck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đưa một caribou xuống với một cú bắn vào cổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hit, stroke, or kick of the ball in sports such as basketball, tennis, or golf.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his partner pulled off a winning backhand shot
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đối tác của anh ta rút ra một cú sút ba tay chiến thắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a ball of stone or metal used as a missile fired from a large gun or cannon.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she took a shot of me holding a lamp near my face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy chụp tôi cầm một cái đèn gần mặt tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small drink, especially of distilled liquor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he took a shot of whiskey
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta chụp một miếng rượu whisky

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the launch of a space rocket.
past and past participle of shoot.
(of colored cloth) woven with a warp and weft of different colors, giving a contrasting iridescent effect when looked at from different angles.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a completely shot engine will put you out of the race
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một động cơ hoàn toàn bắn sẽ đưa bạn ra khỏi cuộc đua
